DOC.brief_title: Biomarkers Tissue Samples From Young Patients With Liver Cancer
DOC.detailed_description: PRIMARY OBJECTIVES : I . To identify biomarker signature associate hepatoblastoma subtypes ( microRNA array profiling ) , potential correlation liver developmental stage well outcome . II . To correlate expression array data copy number array data . SECONDARY OBJECTIVES : I . To carry focused sequence interrogation amplify deleted genomic region well gene key cell pathway involve embryonic development and/or stem cell signal pathway preliminary data suggest involvement pathogenesis hepatoblastoma . II . To perform whole exome sequence subset tumor . OUTLINE : This multicenter study . Archived tumor tissue sample analyze hepatoblastoma liver tumor biomarkers microRNA array profile exome sequencing . Results compare patient ' clinical data .
DOC.criteria: Diagnosis hepatoblastoma liver cancer include follow subtypes : Pure fetal histology Transitional histology Small cell undifferentiated histology Participated Children 's Oncology Group ( COG ) clinical trial Available data tumor sample
